Title: Responsable des Ressources Humaines
Niveau d'étude: DESS, DEA, Master, Bac + 5, Grandes Ecoles
Description de l'emploi: Vous intégrerez nos fonctions support et vous serez sous la responsabilité du DG et des DRH Tunisie et Groupe.Point de contact RH principal des directeurs et des collaborateurs de la Tunisie, vous êtes en charge de la mise en œuvre de la politique Ressources Humaines locale, vous serez l’interlocuteur privilégié et de la DRH groupe. Vous ferez ainsi le lien entre le business et la gestion des Ressources Humaines.Vos principales missions sont :• S’assurer du déploiement de la stratégie RH en lien avec la DG et la DRH et de l’application des process RH.• Accompagner les Managers dans la compréhension des enjeux RH et le développement de leurs équipes.• Inscrire vos actions dans un mode support au business et agir comme un véritable Business Partner, coach auprès de la direction et des métiers.• Porter la culture du groupe et la diffuser auprès de l’ensemble des collaborateurs ; en s’assurant du bon climat social.• Être force de proposition et assurer le pilotage des projets RH locaux et groupe (fidélisation des talents, rétentions, attractivité, diversité...).• Piloter les recrutements en lien avec la DRH Centrale et les équipes Finance.• Remonter les besoins de formation nécessaires à l’accompagnement de la croissance du business.• Réaliser et Analyser les Dashboards RH mensuels et les présenter aux managers.• Animer les revues de performance annuelles et assister aux Comités carrières.• Manager une équipe RH locale de support.• Participer aux projets transverses menés par la DRH groupe.
Exigences de l'emploi: • Vous avez un Diplôme universitaire en gestion des ressources humaines (a minima niveau Mastère ou équivalent)• Vous disposez d'au moins 5 ans d'expérience dans un poste similaire au sein d’une multinationale ou d’un cabinet de Conseil.• Vous êtes dotés d’une culture RH et managériale qui vous permet de bien maîtriser les enjeux du développement RH (formation, recrutement, gestion des Talents...) et du pilotage de projets RH.• Vous possédez de solide connaissance juridique et une maîtrise des outils innovants de GRH (SIRH, HCM, ...).• Vous êtes un véritable leader, vos qualités d’écoute et votre capacité à insuffler le changement sont reconnues et seront primordiales dans le succès de cette mission.• Vous avez une grande aisance dans la communication orale et écrite alliée à un très bon sens de la formalisation et vous utilisez parfaitement les outils bureautiques.• Vous avez une bonne maitrise de l’anglais à l’écrit et à l’oral.

Title: IATF16949 Consultant
Description de l'emploi: Fluent English expression and IATF audit related experience and licenseMore than 3 years of experienceHave ISO14001 related experience and license will be better.The main role of the ISO 14001 environmental consultant is to plan, build and manage programs to bring your environmental management system into line with the ISO 14001 standard.In addition to the ISO 14001 certification process, the environmental consultant, who is also IRCA certified, carries out internal audits and promotes compliance with good environmental practices through internal communication and awareness-raising initiatives.Plan vital activities before the certification auditPrepare employees for the certification processCheck that procedures and processes are operating correctlyReview and update documentation
Exigences de l'emploi: **IATF 16949:2016 Certification**:The consultant must have IATF 16949:2016 certification, which is the quality management system standard specific to the automotive industry. He/she must also have VDA 6.3 process auditor certification.The IATF 16949 consultant's mission is to verify the compliance with the requirements of IATF 16949:2016. Also, must help the company to demonstrate the ability to consistently supply products and services that comply with the standard, additional customer requirements (CSR customers specific requirements) and applicable legal and regulatory requirements.The auditor's mission requires mastery of the automotive industry's Core Tools - FMECA, SPC, APQP/PPAP and MSA - and verification of their implementation within the company.**Understanding of IATF 16949 Requirements**: A comprehensive understanding of the requirements outlined in the IATF 16949 standard, particularly those relevant to wire harness manufacturing and automotive electrical systems.**Extensive Automotive Industry Experience**: The consultant should have significant experience working within the automotive industry, preferably in roles related to wire harness manufacturing or automotive electrical systems.**Expertise in Wire Harness Manufacturing**: In-depth knowledge of wire harness manufacturing processes, including design, production, testing, and quality control procedures, is essential.**Auditing Experience**: The consultant should have experience conducting audits in accordance with IATF 16949 standards and VDA 6.3, including internal audits within automotive manufacturing facilities.**Problem-Solving Skills**: The ability to identify issues, analyze root causes, and implement effective corrective actions within the wire harness manufacturing process.**Communication Skills**:Strong communication skills are necessary to effectively liaise with automotive manufacturers, communicate audit findings, and provide recommendations for improvement.The consultant manages and monitors action plans in direct contact with the customer.The consultant helps train staff in the IATF standard and basic tools.**Continual Learning and Adaptability**: A commitment to staying updated on industry trends, changes in regulations, and advancements in wire harness technology is crucial for maintaining relevance and effectiveness as a consultant.**Professional Certification**: Additional certifications related to quality management systems, automotive manufacturing, or electrical engineering can further enhance the consultant's qualifications.**References and Track Record**: Positive references and a proven track record of successful IATF audits and consulting engagements within the automotive industry are important indicators of the consultant's capabilities and reliability.

Title: Développeur Expérimenté Vue.js 3
Type d'emploi désiré: CDI, CDD, Temps plein, Contrat al Karama, SIVP
Description de l'emploi: En tant que développeur Vue.js 3  vous serez intégré à notre équipe de développement et vous contribuerez à la création, à la maintenance et à l'amélioration de nos applications web. Vous aurez l'opportunité  de travailler aux côtés de développeurs expérimentés et en participant à des projets stimulants.Participer au développement et à la maintenance des applications web en utilisant Vue.js 3.Collaborer avec l'équipe de développement pour concevoir et mettre en œuvre des fonctionnalités innovantes et conviviales.Assurer des tests unitaires rigoureux pour garantir la qualité du code.Contribuer à l'optimisation des performances des applications web.Suivre les meilleures pratiques de développement et rester à jour avec les nouvelles technologies et les tendances du marché.
Exigences de l'emploi: En tant que développeur front-end spécialisé dans Vue.js 3, voici quelques exigences courantes que les employeurs peuvent rechercher :1. Maîtrise de Vue.js 3**: Une connaissance approfondie de Vue.js 3 est essentielle, y compris la compréhension de ses concepts fondamentaux tels que les composants, les directives, les transitions et les états de composants.2. HTML, CSS et JavaScript**: Une solide compréhension du HTML, du CSS et du JavaScript est indispensable pour le développement front-end, car Vue.js s'appuie sur ces technologies. Cela inclut également une connaissance des dernières normes et des meilleures pratiques en matière de HTML5 et CSS3.3. Expérience avec les outils de construction et de gestion des dépendances**: Une expérience pratique avec des outils tels que Webpack, Vue CLI, NPM ou Yarn est souvent requise pour gérer efficacement les dépendances et compiler les ressources front-end.4. Connaissance des frameworks CSS**: Une expérience avec des frameworks CSS comme Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS ou Bulma peut être un plus, en particulier pour le développement rapide d'interfaces utilisateur.5. Compétences en conception responsive et adaptable**: La capacité à créer des interfaces utilisateur réactives qui s'adaptent à différentes tailles d'écran et appareils est cruciale.6. Familiarité avec les tests unitaires et les outils de test automatisés**: Une compréhension des principes de base des tests unitaires et de l'intégration continue, ainsi que l'expérience de l'utilisation de frameworks de test comme Jest ou Mocha, est souvent recherchée.7. Bonne compréhension des principes de conception et d'accessibilité**: Une sensibilité à la conception centrée sur l'utilisateur et une compréhension des normes d'accessibilité Web (comme les WCAG) sont de plus en plus importantes.8. Expérience avec les systèmes de contrôle de version**: Une familiarité avec les systèmes de contrôle de version tels que Git est souvent nécessaire pour collaborer efficacement au sein d'une équipe de développement.9. Capacité à travailler en équipe**: Des compétences en communication et la capacité à travailler efficacement avec d'autres développeurs, concepteurs et parties prenantes sont essentielles.10. Veille technologique**: Une volonté et une capacité à rester à jour avec les dernières tendances, les meilleures pratiques et les évolutions de Vue.js et des technologies front-end connexes sont importantes pour rester compétitif sur le marché du travail.

Title: Digital Facilities Engineer
Description de l'emploi: Objectives :• Ensure LCI (Life Cycle Information) data to be captured, structured and handovered during all phases of the Facility (from conception to decommissioning).• Establish and ensure implementation of the LCI strategy along the value chain.• Ensure the Project’s requirements (bridged with Client and OPF LCI standard requirements) in terms of LCI data management are followed. Project LCI deliverables progress as per schedule• Coordination of LCI requirements between disciplines to meet all Project stakeholders needsActivities :• Monitor in detail the implementation of LCI requirements (including Company provided systems/ tools) in projects• Coordinate with operation to ensure plant LCI requirement is implemented• Coordinate transfer of LCI to the company’s Operation• Perform QA/QC of technical information delivery in projects• Validation of Data to check consistency in Tagging• Ensure Parent –Child relationships and Document to Tag Cross references• Assist Project LCI Lead in LCI related processes and procedures• Preparation of Master Tag register (MTR) and ensure that it complies with all Project requirements• Ensure Functional & Physical attributes of Equipment are captured according to the Information specification• Support and contribute to Contractor’s work performance and deliverables by active collaboration in Contractor’s work tasks and systems• Liaise with discipline Package Responsible Engineers and LCI champions to ensure work prioritizing and progress• Contribute to correct deliverables within documentation and completion through active quality assurance by checking of Contractor’s engineering register data and Vendor tag attributes• Review and check consistency of EPC indexes and vendor data in Contractor’s EDMS system• Actively use Company’s Project Completion System to monitor progress on vendor data, Mechanical Completion Check Records, FAT reports and final documentation• Mapping tags to Systems / Sub systems within Commissioning to check Installation progress• Report progress by submitting and presenting weekly status reports• Review and comment Contractor’s issuance of engineering documentation within the contractual response times definedProcesses :Project Execution Phase :• Provide PBS (Plant Breakdown Structure), Data Model and RDL to Engineering• Control data/documents submission to be data-centric• Monitor and Control Handovers to other partiesProject Handover Phase :• Prepare Data Close out Report• Data Transfer to Owner Company Systems• Ensure Configuration Management is fulfilledKey Indicators :• Progressive handover during all phases of the project to PMC, client, O&M• MTR, Tag Count, CFIHOS Attributes Completion
Exigences de l'emploi: Prior Experience/Expertise Required :• Degree within an engineering discipline (mechanical, electrical, automation, HVAC).• Previous work experience from use of project completion systems.• Experience in working with CFIHOS, ISO15926• Experience in working with AVEVA NET / AVEVA AIM or Intergraph Smart plant Tools like SPF (Smart Plant Foundation)• Documented training or competence within database systems and data management.• General knowledge of CFIHOS/ISO standards for documentation.• Fluent skills in writing and speaking the English language is required.• Minimum 5 years’ experience in Information Management / Data delivery Projects• Ability to work independently and in a multi-discipline team, including advising and leading Contractor’s resources• Structured work methods, task management, reporting and documentation

Title: External Relations Specialist
Zone: Avenue de la bourse, les jardins du Lac, Tunis
Description de l'emploi: Leaders International:Leaders International is an international network of local organizations that plans, manages, and monitors innovation and economic development interventions in the region. Through its offices in Brussels, Tunisia, Amman, and Ramallah, Leaders International provides complete project- management services with a focus on private-sector development, enterprise development, job creation, entrepreneurship, D4D, economic policy dialogue, and tourism value chain development.Project Background:The TANIT project emerges from the critical need to bolster the capacity of Civil Society Organizations (CSOs) in Tunisia, particularly within the alternative tourism sector. This initiative recognizes the pivotal role CSOs play in advocating for sustainable and inclusive development, with a specific emphasis on gender equality and human rights. Drawing from the insights and accomplishments of past endeavors like the 4T project, TANIT extends its reach to encompass diverse regions such as the Northwest, Zaghouan, and Dahar. By empowering CSOs through targeted training, coaching, and collaborative platforms, TANIT endeavors to catalyze positive change and foster a more equitable and resilient alternative tourism in Tunisia.Objective:The objective of the project is to strengthen local civil society actors in Tunisia's alternative tourism sector, focusing on promoting inclusive and sustainable development with an emphasis on gender and human rights. Through targeted training, coaching, and networking initiatives, the project aims to enhance the advocacy capabilities of Civil Society Organizations (CSOs), foster gender sensitivity, and facilitate stakeholder engagement. Ultimately, the project seeks to drive positive change and foster inclusive growth within Tunisia's alternative tourism industry.Activity:We are seeking an External Relations Specialist to provide the following services under the supervision of the Business Development Director:1. Business Development:• Identify potential funding opportunities, partnerships, and collaboration opportunities aligned with the project's objectives. • Cultivate and maintain relationships with existing and potential donors, partners, and supporters. • Support the development of project proposals, grant applications, and fundraising strategies. • Collaborate with project team members to ensure alignment and coordination of external relations efforts with project activities2. Stakeholder Engagement:• Identify and map key stakeholders, including government agencies, CSOs, donors, and media outlets, relevant to the project's objectives. • Develop and maintain a database of contacts and partners for ongoing communication and engagement. • Organize meetings, workshops, and networking events to facilitate dialogue and collaboration among stakeholders. • Represent the project at external events, conferences, and forums to raise awareness and promote project activities3. Communications:• Develop and implement a communication strategy to promote project achievements, activities, and impact. • Produce high-quality communication materials, including press releases, newsletters, and social media content. • Coordinate media relations activities, including pitching stories, arranging interviews, and responding to media inquiries.
Exigences de l'emploi: Qualifications Required:• Bachelor's degree in communications, international relations, public relations, or related field; Master's degree preferred. • Minimum of 4 years of relevant experience in external relations, communications, or partnership development, preferably in NGO sector. • Demonstrated experience in stakeholder engagement, networking, and partnership-building with government agencies, CSOs, donors, and other stakeholders. • Strong communication skills, including writing, editing, and public speaking, with proficiency in English, Arabic and French. • Proven ability to work effectively in a multicultural team environment and to manage multiple priorities and deadlines. Objective Activity Qualifications Required • Familiarity with the context of Tunisia and the alternative tourism sector is an advantage.
